summary: A pure colourful, stylised and fantasy ENB preset.
descriptionHtml:
An NLA-based ENB preset, Bright and vivid days, dark and intimidating nights, the screenshots speak for themselves.


Still working on new tweaks.


Screenshots of latest version are labelled 'v1_0'
(Apologies for any sh*tty resolution screenshots).
[b][u]Imgur album of latest version:
[color=#ffff00]http://imgur.com/a/XfCw0[/color][/u][/b]




I am currently working on a Climates of Tamriel version of this preset, along with some other ideas, such as a more 'natural' version.
[b][u][color=#ff7700]


ATTENTION:[/color][/u][/b] I recently discovered that the value in the enblocal.ini, '[b][u]ExpandSystemMemoryX64[/u][/b]', was causing a crash upon loading a saved game.
Now, I do not know exactly what the problem here is as that value was working perfectly fine before my fresh install of Win7, and I do not know if this problem is exclusively on my end or anything.
Nevertheless, if you ARE experiencing crashes on loading a save with this preset, I advise you set [b][u][color=#00ffff]ExpandSystemMemoryX64=true[/color][/u][/b] to [b][u][color=#00ffff]ExpandSystemMemoryX64=false[/color][/u][/b] under the 'Memory' section of the enblocal.ini. I haven't updated the preset with this change as it so minuscule and not everyone is having problems but there you go (the value is already set to false in the latest version).





I drew a lot of influence from Unreal's preset(s), however I wanted more light and exaggerated colours.

[b][u]



Install:[/u][/b]
1. Get the enbseries v0.266 d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe from http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm
2. Copy them into your Skyrim main folder (Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim).
3. Download Orion ENB from the 'Files' tab on this page.
4. Copy everything into your Skyrim main folder like in step 2.
5. Activate the Natural Lighting and Atmospherics.esp in your mod manager of choice.
6. Download and activate 'Supreme Storms'.
7. Download and activate 'True Storms - Thunder and Rain Redone' - select the NLA and Supreme Storms compatibility options in the installation.
(I recommend also getting 'Lighting During Thunderstorms' if you want to make storms look even better, it's optional though).


In the [b]enblocal.ini[/b] - change the [b]'VideoMemorySizeMb'[/b] to your [b]GPU VRAM[/b] (1024 = 1GB).
Apparently it is best if the value is set to your RAM  + VRAM - 2048[color=#808080] [/color](thanks to SkyrimTuner), hence the reason why I had mine set to 10240 (8192 + 4096 - 2048 = 10240), it will most likely be different to yours unless you have the same specs me then you can leave the value alone.

It is very necessary you use the [b]weather plugin[/b] provided ([b]100% created by [u]Confidence Man[/u][/b]) for this ENB preset and no other weather/lighting mod.
I am currently working on a CoT version of this preset.
Using the weather plugin means you can get the correct look and the added cloudless clear weather type that makes up so much of this ENB's look and what the preset was tweaked for. 

This preset was created around '[b]Enhanced Lights and FX[/b]' so I strongly recommend you use that instead of 'Realistic Lighting Overhaul', again, I haven't tested it with RLO anyway so I don't know how it looks.

To reiterate, the weather plugin was [b]NOT[/b], in any means made by me. It was all [b]Confidence Man[/b].
[center]
[b][u]










CHANGE LOG:[/u][/b]

[u]Version 1.1[/u]

- Tweaked 3 different types of weathers for a little more variation
- Made nights brighter
- Tweaked Adaptation

[u]


Version 1.0[/u]

- Now utilising enbhelper with every weather tweaked specifically for it's atmosphere
- No more extremely dark shadows
- Tweaked SweetFX
- A lot crisper and less cartoonish
- Tweaked nights
- Tweaked Adaptation
- Tweaked water
- And sooo much more




[u]Version BETA 1.5 Changes:[/u]

- New SweetFX settings
- Tweaked Ambient Lighting
- Tweaked sky gradients during sunrise and sunset (looks a lot more beautiful)
- Tweaked Point Lighting
- Tweaked Clouds [/center]

[center][b][u][color=#ffff00]









Mods used in screenshots (and highly recommended in general):[/color][/u][/b][/center]

[center][b][u][color=#00ff00]Environment and Textures:[/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#00ff00][/color][/u][/b]

Official High Res Texture Packs
ELFX (w/ Enhancer & Exteriors)
Enhanced Distant Terrain
Skyrim Distance Overhaul
Skyrim HD 2K (LITE)
Real Wood Textures - Farmhouses
SkyFalls+SkyMills
SMIM (w/ ELFX Patch)
Project Parallax Remastered (w/ SMIM Bridge)
Better Dynamic Snow
Vivid Landscapes - Dungeons and Ruins - ENB - 2048 (w/ Better Dynamic Snow, SMIM & ELFX Patches)
Vivid Landscapes - Volcanic Area - ENB - 2048
aMidianBorn - Caves and Mines
aMidianBorn - Book of Silence (Armors)
Detailed Rugs
Natural Grass Texture Floor
High Definition Ivy
Vivid Landscapes - Cliffs and Creeks
Moss Rocks 
Vivid Landscapes - Tundra Moss Revised (w/ SMIM Patch)
Realsitic Water Two (w/ ENB Textures)
Pure Waters - Landscape Textures
Dust Effects
Realistic Smoke and Embers
Enhanced Night Skyrim - High Stars
Enhanced Blood Textures
 Rainbows
Vivid Landscapes - Birthsigns
Vibrant Auroras
Weathered Road Signs
Northfire's Mountains with parallax 2K

Skygazer Moons - Masser and Secunda
Ultimate Lush Overhaul - Vanilla
Lush Aspen Trees
Unique Grasses and Groundcovers

CM Bark
Kakasi's ICE Texture

Farmhouse Chimneys
DANDELION SEEDS
Hold Border Banners

No Snow Under The Roof
4K Parallax Skyrim 2015
aMidianBorn - Book of Silence (Creatures, Unique Items, Weapons)
Skyrim Subsurface Scattering and Particle Patches for ENB

Book Covers Skyrim (w/ Optional Paper textures)
Wet and Cold w/ Wet and Cold Ashes














Thanks to: [b][u][color=#00ffff]Boris Vorontsov[/color][/u][/b] for ENB. [b][u][color=#00ff00]CeeJay.dk[/color][/u][/b] for SweetFX Shader Suite. [b][u][color=#ffff00]Confidence Man[/color][/u][/b] for the weather esp and letting me use it.[/center]
author: Strife0096

files.name: Orion ENB BETA v1.0 - Slightly Less Bright
